attributes.action: Order a military extraction of Gillian Gibbons to save the life of an innocent British citizen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that the British Government come to the defence of Gillian Gibbons, who has been arrested and imprisoned and now faces death from the Sudanese public. This is a total insult to the British people and the tolerant society we have tried to create. We petition the Prime Minister to call for a military extraction to remove Ms. Gibbons from the Sudan and escort her safely returned to the British Isles.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
